Thus, today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy necessary cosmetics and makeup to satisfy her customers' requests. Kifah is the first lady on the right in the photo.

With respect to the other group members, Fatima is the lady in the middle, and Wafaa is the first lady on the left in the photo.

loans.use: to buy the necessary cosmetics and makeup.

loans.name: Casty

texts.en:
Casty is 40 years old, strong, full of energy, and hardworking. She hails from the Chuka area of Kenya, a place that is blessed with good weather patterns and is one of the best areas on earth to practice farming. Casty has a handsome husband and six children that she really admires and would do anything so that they never lack anything.

Through practicing dairy and crop farming, she has always been able to provide food for her family and also meet their basic needs. She has acquired much experience over the last 10 years, and this has helped her earn profits. She is seeking a loan for KES 10,000 to buy poultry and, through the loan, she is sure that she will satisfy the demand for poultry products in Chuka, which is densely populated and has a ready markets for eggs and poultry. Because of the immense knowledge that Casty has and also because of the good will she enjoys with the villagers, she will not have any challenge in selling her products. She also believes that through word of mouth, she will be able to get more customers and increase her customer base. Increased profit levels will translate into better living conditions for Casty and her family, and this will also allow her to make permanent changes to her life and increase her business.

Be inspired make a loan!

loans.use: to buy poultry for her farm.

loans.name: San Blas Group

texts.es:
El grupo se encuentra trabajando dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, es un comité nuevo que está en su ciclo uno, y desean ayudarse las unas a las otras para mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Patricia, quien vende ropas variadas, y por medio de su pequeño negocio se gana la vida de una manera digna y honesta. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora que se sacrifica por su familia, para poder darles una vida digna y sin privaciones.
La Sra. Patricia solicita de este préstamo para la compra de prendas de todo tipo para vender, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo y mejorando sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
The group works with the poverty elimination program. It is a new committee in its first cycle, and they want to help each other to improve their living conditions.

One of the members is Sra. Patricia. She sells a variety of clothing, and with her small business she earns respectable and honest living. She is a very hard-working and enterprising person who makes sacrifices for her family, in order to give them decent life without deprivations.

Sra. Patricia is requesting this loan to buy clothing of all kinds for sale. This will help her solidify her business plan, which will help her improve her income. She is grateful for the opportunity that she is getting to be able to continue growing and bettering her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy clothing of all kinds for sale.

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 21-year-old single man. He is the sole breadwinner of his family since he lives with his divorced mom, and works hard to provide her with a better life.

Mohamad specializes in aluminum work. He established his current business in aluminum work in 2004, and is working hard to develop it as much as he can.

Mohamad established his current business after he quit his previous job when he had an accident and had to stay without work for a long sick leave.

Today, Mohamad is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy a car that is necessary for his business development in order to transport his business tools to projects in the nearby villages.

He hopes to stay capable of developing his business in a well-managed way to make sure he can reach wider regions.

loans.use: to buy a car necessary for his business development in order to transport his business tools to projects in the nearby villages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy noodles, eggs, seasonings, toiletries, soft drinks, candies, detergent and rice.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm inputs

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza is a resident of Tubigon, Bohol. She is 38 years old andmarried with two children aged eight and three years old. Her husband is a welder abroad while Flordeliza is doing the fishing business to earn additional income. She has been doing this for eight years and earns about PHP 2,800 per month.

Flordeliza is asking for a loan to buy a new fishing net and pay for boat maintenance. She wishes to improve her business to have a better means of living.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and pay for boat maintenance.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish, seasoning, meat, condiments and vegetables

loans.name: Benson

texts.en:
Benson is 33 years old, with one child to support plus three dependents. He runs a business of motorcycle transport for the last fifteen years. Right now his monthly income is ksh12,000.

He is taking a loan of ksh 30,000 to purchase vegetables,onions,tomatoes for sale and also to buy spare parts for the motorcycle. He would use the anticipated profit to repay the loan and pay schoolfees for his children.

This is his first loan from visionfund. He hopes and dreams for future business is to be financial stable and improve the living standard of his family.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, onions, vegetables and buy spare parts for the motorcycle.

loans.name: Adnan

texts.en:
Adnan is 35 year old married and father of five children, Adnan did not complete his education because of the financial situation for his family, and he opened his own business.

After his children started go to the school and asking him question and he could not answer, he has decided to complete his education a year ago, and he is applying for his second loan to help pay for the university fees and achieve his dreams.

loans.use: to pay for his own tuition fees as a mature student.

loans.name: Haleemah

texts.en:
In a society that does not believe in women's capabilities and the importance of women`s education, Haleema could not complete her education and got married.

Haleema is 29 years old, married and young mother for three children, Haleema has a dream which to complete her education and to find a good job to be a productive woman.

After she got married she joined a social collage to start her road to her dreams, she studied a graphic design and got a very good marks.

Then she headed for the study of Islamic art and architecture in the university. Now Haleemah in her last year and she will graduate with excellent degree making her university`s management give her a scholarship to complete her master's degree.

Haleema is an example of an ambitious and willpower lady and she is achieving her dreams step by step, so she will be a very successful woman.

Haleema is applying for the loan to help her pay for the university fees to complete her bachelor degree and start her new journey in her education road.

loans.use: to pay her university education fees in Islamic Art and Architecture

loans.name: Tareq

texts.en:
Tarek is an example of an ambitious guy. He is 21 years old and lives in Irbid with his family of 6 members. He is works in addition to studying for his education. He helps his mother with the household expenses because his father died many years ago and Tarek became responsible for his family along with his mother.

Tarek is studying in his second year to take his Bachelor`s degree in Art. Tarek is applying for an education loan to help him to cover the rest of the semester fees.

loans.use: to pay fees for his next semester now they are due.

loans.name: Ama-Faustina

texts.en:
Ama-Faustina is 34 years old and she lives with her family in Chorkor area of the capital city of the country. Ama-Faustina has been selling eggs to her customers for 5 years but she was selling second hand clothing before switching on to sell eggs. Ama-Fuastina has four children who are all schooling.

Ama-Faustina’s husband is also trader, who also work hard so that together they can take care of their home and children.  She is asking for and amount of GHS 3,200 to buy more crates of eggs which she will sell to customers. Apart from taking good care of her home she will also need to improve her five years business.

loans.use: to buy more crates of eggs which she will sell to customers.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mari is a 22 year old student from the small village Zegduleti. She lives with her husband and their two little children. Mari studies education to become a teacher in the future.

The loan is used to buy two milk cows and some calves. Cows are very important on the countryside of Georgia. They can use the milk-products for own use and selling also. With the credit you help the family to get a little more independent.

loans.use: to buy two milk cows and some calves.

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina engages in farming. She grows and sells green leafy vegetables like alugbati (red vine), malunggay (horse raddish tree) and squash. Aside from vegetable farming, she raises and sells hogs.
She has been engaged in vegetable farming for 3 years now. She is married with three children ages 12, 7 and 3 years old respectively. Her husband's occupation is a carpenter.

She has requested a loan to buy fertilizers and feeds for the pigs. She could sold quality hogs and improve the yield of her farm. Slowly, she could able to maintain and manage her earnings well.
She is determined to handle her both sources of income to be successful but also continue finance the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and feeds for the pigs

loans.name: Aristona

texts.en:
She is Aristona, 63 years old, a long time member of CCT's Gen. Trias, Cavite Branch. She and her husband Rosendo is thankful that even tho they belong to the low income level they are content that they have raised their children well and are now working. To be able to provide for their needs, Aristona thought of going into business such as a beauty parlor.

Aristona has been operating her parlor for two years already which is doing quite well. Glad that she was able to invest in this kind of business which not gives her not only income but fulfillment for doing what she loves most. She thanks God for Kiva and CCT for using them as instruments to assist small business men like her.

She would like to request a loan in the amount of Php 25000 loan to buy the regular needs of her salon such hair dyes, shampoo, hot oil, conditioner, hair scissors. Her passion for beauty and friendly personality makes people come to her salon.

Aristona dreams of having a bigger salon and be able to buy a house. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God which she studies.

 *All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro-Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for hair dye, hair treatment, shampoo, conditioner, new scissors needed for her parlor.

loans.name: Osama

texts.en:
Osama is a single man living in a sector of Jordan called Irbid. He is studying to get his bachelor degree in Interior Design and he is now in his second year. The income that comes from his father’s pension is income for his family that consists of six members. Recently his father is facing some problems that lead Osama to apply for an educational loan to help him cover his semester fees.

Osama`s future plan is to work in his field of study.

loans.use: to pay his second year university fees in Interior Design
